long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension changes the links on webpages to a link for the Never Gonna Give You Up video by Rick Astley on you tube (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oHg5SJYRHA0). If the icon is green, the links are rick rolls. If icon is grey, and you have reloaded your current page, then links will go back to normal.

If the user clicks on the links while the icon is green and then clicks the back button, the webpage that they return to will have the images converted to the eye favicon I made.
